misuses.description: The method1() method in C1 class is vulnerable to broken crypto algorithm, as it is using the AES/ECB/PKCS5Padding algorithm which is not secure for encrypting large amounts of data. It should use a more secure algorithm such as AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding or AES/GCM/NoPadding.
misuses.recommendation: Replace AES/ECB/PKCS5Padding with a more secure algorithm such as AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding or AES/GCM/NoPadding.

misuses.description: The method1() method in C1 class is vulnerable to incorrect padding, as it is using the PKCS5Padding algorithm which is not secure for encrypting large amounts of data. It should use a more secure algorithm such as AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding or AES/GCM/NoPadding.
misuses.recommendation: Replace PKCS5Padding with a more secure algorithm such as AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding or AES/GCM/NoPadding.
